<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rescission of contract">1f4278f11bd52110b7617448cd4bcb58</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages>OrderIdValidation</messages><name>OnSubmit restrict the Order-ID</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    if (g_form.getValue('checkbox') == true || g_form.getValue('checkbox') == 'true') {
        g_form.addErrorMessage(getMessage('OrderIdValidation'));
        return false;
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tata.jaiswal</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-05 15:21:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dc71d1381b1b6d907aeaca616b4bcbd2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnSubmit restrict the Order-ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Model-D" source="x_4dai_model_d">ee33b22e1bb70d907aeaca616b4bcb46</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Model-D">ee33b22e1bb70d907aeaca616b4bcb46</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_dc71d1381b1b6d907aeaca616b4bcbd2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>leonid.khaylov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-11 08:53:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
